LanguageData.SPL.BillHelp: (Clear the filter first and then select a seed before selecting this bill type.)
LanguageData.SPL.RequiresRestart: The following settings require a game restart:
LanguageData.SPL.MarketValueModifier: Market value modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.MarketValueModifierDesc: The market value of seeds is multiplied by this value. Reduce this if you want cheaper seeds to buy.
LanguageData.SPL.SeedExtractionModifier: Seed extraction modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.SeedExtractionModifierDesc: The amount of seeds extracted from produce is multiplied by this value. Most extractions are {0} by default.
LanguageData.SPL.SeedFactorModifier: Seed factor modifier (Mod default: {0}, Min: {1}, Max: {2}):
LanguageData.SPL.SeedFactorModifierDesc: The number of seeds a plant will normally yield is multiplied by this value. Most plants drop {0} seed by default, with a bonus roll for more.
